Class Cabin

java.lang.Object
  uk.heriotwatt.sef.model.Cabin

public class Cabin
extends java.lang.Object

Stores the values associated with a cabin.

Author:
Florian Bergmann

public Cabin(int cabinNumber,
             int[] beds,
             double size,
             Facilities facilities,
             Name owner,
             Condition condition)
Creates a new cabin object with the specified values.

Parameters:
cabinNumber - The cabin number.
beds - The array of beds in the cabin..
size - The size of the cabin.
facilities - The facilites of the cabin.
owner - The owner of the cabin.
condition - The condition of the cabin.
Method Detail

getCabinNumber

public int getCabinNumber()
Returns the cabin number.

Returns:
The number of cabins stored in the manager.

Parameters:
cabinNumber - Number to be set.

getNumberOfBeds

public int[] getNumberOfBeds()
Returns the beds of the cabin as array. Each array-cell represents a room, each value of a cell the number of beds in the room.

Returns:
Array of beds.

setNumberOfBeds

public void setNumberOfBeds(int[] numberOfBeds)
Sets the beds.

Parameters:
numberOfBeds - The new array of beds.

setSize

public void setSize(double size)
Sets the size of the cabin.

Parameters:

getCost

public double getCost()
The cost is calculated based on different factors: - The condition. - The facilities. - The size. - The beds/rooms present (The less beds per room the more expensive). The values associated with the first three are stored in PriceMapping

Returns:
The cost if the cabin.

getCondition

public Condition getCondition()
Returns the cabins condition.

Returns:
The condition.

setCondition

public void setCondition(Condition condition)
Sets the condition of the cabin.

Parameters:
condition - New condition to be set.

Calculates the room to bed ratio.

The room to bed ratio.
